member.name: P:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.AbstractCache.CompressionThreshold
member.summary: 大于指定的字节数，则启用压缩保存

member.name: T:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.ActiveCacheNotify
member.summary: 保持缓存定时更新的ICacheNotify的实现

member.name: T:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket
member.summary: The PooledSocket class encapsulates a socket connection to a specified memcached server. It contains a buffered stream for communication, and methods for sending and retrieving data from the memcached server, as well as general memcached error checking.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket.Dispose
member.summary: Disposing of a PooledSocket object in any way causes it to be returned to its SocketPool.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket.Close
member.summary: This method closes the underlying stream and socket.

member.name: P:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket.IsAlive
member.summary: Checks if the underlying socket and stream is connected and available.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a string to the socket encoded in UTF8 format.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket.Write(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Writes an array of bytes to the socket and flushes the stream.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket.ReadLine
member.summary: Reads from the socket until the sequence '\r\n' is encountered, and returns everything up to but not including that sequence as a UTF8-encoded string

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket.ReadResponse
member.summary: Reads a response line from the socket, checks for general memcached errors, and returns the line. If an error is encountered, this method will throw an exception.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket.Read(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Fills the given byte array with data from the socket.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket.SkipUntilEndOfLine
member.summary: Reads from the socket until the sequence '\r\n' is encountered.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket.Reset
member.summary: Resets this PooledSocket by making sure the incoming buffer of the socket is empty. If there was any leftover data, this method return true.

member.name: T:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.ServerPool
member.summary: The ServerPool encapsulates a collection of memcached servers and the associated SocketPool objects. This class contains the server-selection logic, and contains methods for executing a block of code on a socket from the server corresponding to a given key.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.ServerPool.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IList{M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.ServerNode},M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.ServerScope)
member.summary: Internal constructor. This method takes the array of hosts and sets up an internal list of socketpools.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.ServerPool.GetSocketPool(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Given an item key hash, this method returns the socketpool which is closest on the server key continuum.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.ServerPool.Execute``1(System.UInt32,``0,M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.UseSocket{``0})
member.summary: This method executes the given delegate on a socket from the server that corresponds to the given hash. If anything causes an error, the given defaultValue will be returned instead. This method takes care of disposing the socket properly once the delegate has executed.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.ServerPool.ExecuteAll(M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.UseSocket)
member.summary: This method executes the given delegate on all servers.

member.name: T:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.SocketPool
member.summary: The SocketPool encapsulates the list of PooledSockets against one specific host, and contains methods for acquiring or returning PooledSockets.

member.name: F:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.SocketPool.deadEndPointSecondsUntilRetry
member.summary: If the host stops responding, we mark it as dead for this amount of seconds, and we double this for each consecutive failed retry. If the host comes alive again, we reset this to 1 again.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.SocketPool.getEndPoint(System.String)
member.summary: This method parses the given string into an IPEndPoint. If the string is malformed in some way, or if the host cannot be resolved, this method will throw an exception.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.SocketPool.Acquire
member.summary: Gets a socket from the pool. If there are no free sockets, a new one will be created. If something goes wrong while creating the new socket, this pool's endpoint will be marked as dead and all subsequent calls to this method will return null until the retry interval has passed.

member.name: M:M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.SocketPool.Return(M2SA.AppGenome.Cache.MemCached.PooledSocket)
member.summary: Returns a socket to the pool. If the socket is dead, it will be destroyed. If there are more than MaxPoolSize sockets in the pool, it will be destroyed. If there are less than MinPoolSize sockets in the pool, it will always be put back. If there are something inbetween those values, the age of the socket is checked. If it is older than the SocketRecycleAge, it is destroyed, otherwise it will be put back in the pool.
